If the default width is left empty, it will be computed according to the image ratio. Otherwise, the image will have a fixed size. ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultTextWrap=Default Text Wrap ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultTextWrap_hint=When checked, the tewt will wrap around the image by default. ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultWidth=Default Width ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_defaultWidth_hint=The default with of the image. If the default height is left empty, it will be computed according to the image ratio. Otherwise, the image will have a fixed size. ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_prettyName=Pretty Name ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_prettyName_hint=User oriented name of the image style. ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_type=Type ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ImageStyleClass_type_hint=The type of the image style (used as a css class). ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ConfigurationClass_defaultStyle=Default Style ### Missing: Image.Style.Code.ConfigurationClass_defaultStyle_hint=The default image style for this wiki.
